name: Lucky Penguin
overview:
He Makes His Own Luck!

Meet Nestorzim the penguin. What a fortunate guy, he finds four-leafed clovers all the time! But Nestorzim doesn't need lucky charms, that's why he destroys every clover he sees. Can you guide this lucky penguin through 40 stages and feed his appetite for destruction in this action puzzle game?

Features:

- Solve 40 stages of challenging mazes!
- Finish puzzles quickly in a race against the clock!
- Mix it up with teletransporters, screen wrap, and more!
- Become the charming, clover-crushing Nestorzim!
- Use passcodes to jump right back into where you left off!
- Enjoy the magic of Flick-o-Vision that squeezes all of the graphical juice from this beloved console!
